long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
AccessUNC offers quick and convenient access to a wide range of common social media links, UNC resident resources, and medical research tools. Customize your experience using the button in the top left corner. 

Functions: 
- Quick access to Qgenda, Onyen, MedHub, Citrix, and Outlook 
- Easy access to PowerShare, UNC Interpreter Request
- Current Chapel Hill weather and upcoming forecast
- Quick access to social media and streaming sites
- Built in Orthobullets, PubMed, and UNC Library search tools
